title: Instant Pot Best Beef Stew Recipe
description: This Instant Pot stew recipe is the ultimate, hearty meal with melt-in-your-mouth beef, potatoes, mushrooms, and carrots for a simple midweek dinner.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Soups, Stews and Chili Recipes Stews Beef Instant Pot Best Beef Stew 4.5 (258) 204 Reviews 28 Photos This Instant Pot stew recipe is the ultimate, hearty, melt-in-your-mouth comfort food. It's so easy to make in an Instant Pot for a simple midweek dinner. Submitted by Fioa Updated on February 26, 2023 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 28 28 28 28 Prep Time: 20 mins Cook Time: 55 mins Additional Time: 10 mins Total Time: 1 hr 25 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 1 tablespoon butter 1 pound beef chuck, cut into 1-inch cubes 4 Yukon Gold potatoes, cubed 1 ½ cups mushrooms, halved 1 onion, cut into 6 wedges 2 carrots, cut into 1/2-inch thick slices 2 cloves garlic, minced 3 cups beef broth 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce 1 tablespoon tomato paste 1 teaspoon salt ½ teaspoon ground black pepper ½ teaspoon dried rosemary Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot) and select the Sauté function. Melt butter in the pot. Cook beef chuck cubes in batches until browned on all sides, about 5 minutes per batch. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Return all beef chuck cubes to the pot. Add potatoes, mushrooms, onion, carrots, and garlic; cover with beef broth. Stir in Worcestershire sauce, tomato paste, salt, pepper, and rosemary. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Close and lock the lid. Select Meat/Stew function, according to the manufacturer's instructions; set the timer for 35 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build. Release pressure using the natural-release method, according to the manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. I Made It Print 531 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 352 Calories 16g Fat 32g Carbs 20g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 352 % Daily Value * Total Fat 16g 21% Saturated Fat 7g 36% Cholesterol 59mg 20% Sodium 1321mg 57% Total Carbohydrate 32g 12% Dietary Fiber 4g 14% Total Sugars 5g Protein 20g 40% Vitamin C 8mg 9% Calcium 49mg 4% Iron 3mg 15% Potassium 542mg 12% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Instant Pot Best Beef Stew 01 of 28 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 28 Photo by  Katrina Smiley Rockett 03/20/2025 A keeper! Easy to follow Family favorite I read a few of the reviews and they mentioned not enough flavor. So, after I browned the meat, I also added sweet soy sauce, hoisin sauce, seasoned salt, slap ya mama, lemon pepper, and cayenne pepper. I used flour to thicken it after it was done. I didn't know how it would turn out. I just wished for the best. It had the perfect amount of kick to it. I put it on a bed of rice. I just hope I can duplicate it again. I didn't measure my additions. 03 of 28 Photo by  SillyBeet5629 01/01/2024 A keeper! Easy to follow This recipe is delicious and takes very little prep time. We will be having it more often! 04 of 28 Photo by  LankyMixer5299 12/08/2023 OK with tweaks Needs more flavor Might try again Meat and veggies were cooked perfectly. I used pre cubed stew beef never frozen. The flavor was definitely lacking, I ended up adding a tsp each of cornstarch, chilli powder, Valentina hot sauce and som parsley flakes as well as a Bay leaf. Flavor profile was amazing after the adjustments. Will try again with banana or pepperccini peppers cooked in. 05 of 28 Photo by  TealSieve8695 12/08/2023 OK with tweaks Needs more flavor Might try again The meat and veggies were cooked perfectly, definitely lacked flavor. I ended up adding two tsp cornstarch to thicken sauce, a tsp of chilli powder, a bay leaf, and about a tsp of Valentina hot sauce. Perked it right up with a little kick. I will be making it again maybe with some pepperccini peppers or banana peppers. 06 of 28 Photo by  LaDonna Shrum 01/07/2022 The best beef stew! I will use this recipe again. Ingredients very good, and instructions accurate. The only thing I did different is used a bit more tomato paste, added peas, and thickened with flour a bit when it finished cooking. The stew meat was very tender, vegetables not mushy. 07 of 28 Photo by  Earthdog 05/31/2020 08 of 28 Photo by  Jessica McClellan 02/13/2020 09 of 28 Photo by  barbara 02/12/2020 10 of 28 Photo by  Amy Buchanan 01/14/2020 1 2 3 Next You’ll Also Love Instant Pot Beef and Mushroom Stew 9 Ratings Instant Pot® Stew Using Frozen Meat 28 Ratings Instant Pot® Beef-Mushroom Stew 1 Rating Instant Pot® Spicy Beef Curry Stew 33 Ratings Instant Pot® Bourbon Beef Stew 4 Ratings Instant Pot Beef Stew with Red Wine 7 Ratings Instant Pot Beef Stew with Frozen Meat 4 Ratings Instant Pot® Beef Bourguignon 1 Rating New Mexico Green Chile Brisket Stew Simple Beef Stew 26 Ratings Dutch Oven Beef Stew 12 Ratings Slow Cooker Beef Stew with Red Wine 3 Ratings Chef John's Bigos (Polish Hunter's Stew) 32 Ratings Instant Pot Beef, Mushroom, and Barley Bowl 2 Ratings Make-Ahead Slow Cooker Beef Stew 368 Ratings Hawaiian Beef Stew 7 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
